repository.orgName: Staats- und Universitätsbibliothek Hamburg Carl von Ossietzky

msContents.summary: The manuscript contains Cāṭuślokasaṃgraha, which is a collection of witty verses. It seems that there are different versions of the texts and same titled text is ascribed to poet Kālidāsa also. This manuscript comtains almost 200 verses and at the end some list is also mentioned. This list is written in three column style. End guard folio has title śrīcāṭuśloka and then same verse as cited on the front guard. śrīmate hayagrīvāya namaḥ . āñjaneyaṃ padadvandpadmaja sā naumi sāji ? ajanmaṃ taraṃ rakṣo manmandiraṃ bhajan pandhitarāya śatakādigranthacātuśloka Cāṭuślokasaṃgraha On 1r some verses are written: 1r 1 bhramendrasomavaruṇoścavicintamāne gaurbiśrīyaṃhatavahecayamorthalābhaḥ vāyauvideśagamanaṃ niścita carudhiraṃśesa nāśamiti siddhamunindravākyaṃ 1r 2 vāyuddakṣīṇamīśānaṃ varuṇānalasomayoḥ . nirjjatyaindrādidikbhāge rātrāvavivṛtaḥ punaḥ mṛtyurvayaśriyaśceva suvārtā vijayassukhaṃ santāpaḥ kalahavairya 1r 3 sutālakṣmayagarhitāḥ Some list is given from 54v to 57v (these folio are numbered as 1 to 4 originally.)

msItem.title: Cāṭuślokasaṃgraha

filiation.p: New Catalogus Catalogorum vol 02 pp:2-3 VOHD II,7: P; 928 entry. 2743

msItem.incipit: 1v1 vāspāret svakayat yutodhvadhipatiḥ ku? dhjajātyargaṇe ghgorāghārughurassarrghurutaragraivedhakabrāgharaṃ . udhvidhuścatarakā
msItem.explicit: 54r 5 jalāśayāḥ .. 224 .. .. ājanmasiddhakauṭalyaṃ halasya ca khalasya ca sodhantayomukhākṣe pamalamekaiva sākṣā mā 225 pitravatyabhibuptā pi 54r 6 yā laṃkāpathagāminiṃ sarvadaivakriyātarhi sāsīt digivadakṣiṇā .. 226 .. … ..

extent.measure: 2 guard folio and 54 written 3 folio with list folio

supportDesc.foliation: Tamil numeration in the left margin on the verso of the folio.
supportDesc.condition: good state of preservation with some cracked folio around the edges

additions.desc: On 1v hariḥ oṃ in the left margin.
Front guard -śrīmate hayagrīvāya namaḥ . āñjaneyaṃ padadvandpadmaja sā naumi sāji ? ajanmaṃ taraṃ rakṣo manmandiraṃ bhajan pandhitarāya śatakādigranthacātuśloka

encodingDesc.p: Space is added to separate words.
